name: PolySounds - Animal sounds & more
description: Discover animal, music instrument, vehicles and household sounds   PolySounds - Animal sounds & more, is an educational app that enables toddlers and preschool children to explore over 300 images/sounds, to enrich their vocabulary and to learn words in another language, using the auditory and visual senses. Choose from 6 different categories: farm animals, wild animals, musical instruments, vehicles, and objects (household sounds, tools sounds)  Preschool/School children can use the landscape mode of the device to access a multiple-choice game, which challenges them to select the right name of the illustrated animal, instrument, vehicle, or object.  Have fun with PolySounds - Animal sounds & more!  Features and options:   300 high quality pictures & sounds  4 main categories  Animals sounds  Music Instrument sounds  Vehicle sounds  Household sounds  2 sub categories   Farm Animals and wild animals  Household and tools sounds  15 Languages  Sound, name, text are freely combinable.  Image presentation: Dynamic or Static  Shake the device to hear the sound again  App can be locked after selected time  Add an image to your phones background  Set a sound as a ringtone  Move the app to the SD Card
